name: Highland Warriors
description: In the year of our lord 843, the first king of Scotland, Kenneth McAlpin, united the lands of the Picts and Scots to form the Kingdom of Alba. 400 years later Edward I, also known as the "Hammer of the Scots" engulfed the land in a great feud. It was not long before Edward I controlled most of Scotland.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / 2000 / ME / 98 / 95 / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Pentium III with 800 MHz or compatible Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: 3D vCard with minimal DirectX 8.x support DirectX: Version 8.0 Sound Card: DirectXÂ® 8.0 compatible soundcard

reviews.review_text: This is a great gem of a game from 2003 that I can definately recommend worth buying. I had got this in cdrom back when it was released but have misplaced, I am glad it is now available on steam, If you like age of empires then... you will surely like this. I am playing the game on windows 7 64 bit, just be sure to run the configuration tool first and select your native resolution for best performance.
